titleStmt.title: A second proposal by William Morgan His Majesty's cosmographer, for a general sale of Mr. Ogilby's works, to enable him to finish Britannia, with the second part of Asia, and Europe
titleStmt.author: Morgan, William, d. 1690.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
"By His Majesty's authority under the great seal, &c."
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
